item.title: [Delta] Dicing Command
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I have tried to add a Dicing command as such

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("dice") && playerRights >= 1 && HasItemAmount(995, 250000)){ sM("You are going for greater than 54"); if(misc.random(100) >= 55) sM("You win"); else { sM("You have lost this time"); } }
But i’m trying to make it where it shows the number rolled.
Any idea how to do this.
Btw i know i didn’t add half of the code yet, but that’ll be easy.

Read full topic
